title: Paneer Biryani | One pot cooking ğŸ¤©
content:
Lunch Recipe : Paneer BiryaniÂ  Servings: 4 In India, On special occasions or at parties or on wedding day Biryani must include in the food list because it is a traditional dish following from many years. Biryani is famous in India with gives amazing taste, infused in aromatic Indian spices, combination of vegetables, whole Biryani spices & totally itâ€™s flavourful with Basmati Rice ( long grain )ğŸš Today, Iâ€™m sharing a super delicious, perfect for quick lunch box recipe ideas and instant one-pot cooking rice recipe is Paneer Biryani. Nutritional values of paneer:  
Paneer: 40gms
Protein 7.54gm
Fat 5.88gm
Carbs 4.96gm
Energy 103.15Kcal
Folates 37.32microgram
Calcium 190.4mg
Paneer called as Indian Cottage Cheese which is extract from milk ğŸ¥›Â has lots of good healthy benefits in it. It has all essential nine amino acids, nourishing and healthy when taken in right amounts. Earlier, I have shared few recipes of paneer in my food blog, links shared below you can checkout ğŸ‘‡
  • Paneer Paratha
  • Palak Paneer Gravy
  • Paneer Tikka | Baked | Starter ğŸ˜‹
  • Hariyali Paneer ğŸƒ|Cottage Cheese Green CurryğŸŒ¿
Duration: 40 minutesÂ  Ingredients:
  • Basmati Rice - 1 cup - 160 grams - wash thrice and keep aside
  • Paneer - cubes - 100 grams
  • Cloves - 2
  • Cinnamon stick - 1 inch
  • Cardamom - 2
  • Star Anise - 1
  • Shajeera - 1 teaspoon
  • Bay ğŸƒÂ leafÂ - 1
  • Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 teaspoon
  • White onion - 1/2 cup - chopped
  • Carrot - Â 1 - chopped
  • Beans - 10 - chopped
  • Cauliflower Florets - 10
  • Mint Paste - 1 Tb sp ( blend - mint, coriander,green chillies, ginger piece, salt, lemon juice)
  • Curd - 1/2 cup
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 teaspoon
  • Biryani masala powder - 1 teaspoon
  • Red chilly powder - 1/2 teaspoon
  • Salt - 1 teaspoon
  • Butter - 2 Tb sp
  • Water - 320 ml
Procedure:
  • Heat a heavy bottomed deep fry pan, add butter, shajeera, cloves, cinnamon stick, Cardamom, bay leaf, and fry 30 secs.
  • Then add in chopped paneer cubes, sautÃ© half minute. Next add onion, Carrot, beans and sautÃ© 2 minutes
  • Now, add ginger garlic paste and mint paste sautÃ© Â one minute and add chopped cauliflower florets , rest of the paneer cubes and sautÃ© 2 more minutes
  • Then goes in, salt,Â Biryani Masala Powder, red chilly powder, turmeric powder and curd. Combine well and cook 5 minutes
  • Next add rice and gently mix with spatula then let it set for one minute on medium heat
  • Now add water and mix well
  • Cover with lid and Bring to a boil for 10 minutes and then reduce heat and let it cook for more 10 minutes.( donâ€™t lift the lid in this process because if the vapor goes out and the rice wonâ€™t cook completely)
  • Next open lid and gently mix and check the rice, and turn off heat and let it sit more 5 minutes
  • Serve with Raita or cucumber salad or potato chips ğŸ˜‹
  • Happy Cooking and Have a wonderful day ğŸŒ¸
